website_summaries.verdict: An affordable sofa cover that doesn't compromise on quality or durability.
pros: Durable fabric has a thick inner lining to keep out moisture
Covers go on easily and stay securely attached with plastic clips and elastic drawstrings
Cover sits at a quality price point
cons: White cover becomes visibly dirty faster

customer_reviews.title: Met or exceeded all expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I normally take my cushions off every winter and store in a downstairs room. Got tired of not having my outdoor furniture available during the winter so decided to try these out. It fit my 2 seat glider perfect. The 4 corner buckles are great at holding the cover in place and ensuring the wind does not blow it off or expose the cushions. Vent panel on each side has a canvas overhang to still allow air movement yet prevents rain from blowing in. This is my first year so I can't speak to longevity but they are heavy canvas and seem well made and look like they will last. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: OEB

customer_reviews.title: Not lasting quality
customer_reviews.text: "good quality fast delivery" That was then, this is now->ripped hole, less than one year in. Sorry AmazonBasics, the reason I bought this is so it would protect the love seat, and not rip within one year.
customer_reviews.author: TwoPoint.0

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these covers for 10 months and they have already become brittle and ripped. I would have expected to get at least a year or 2 out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.  “Go ahead, Buy them! “
customer_reviews.text: I struggled as to which cover to buy and I settled for this one mainly because of the price. I received a product that exceeded my expectations. The covers are sturdy, well made, have an air vent on one end, and have handles...I’m not sure why. It has rained everyday in Houston for over three weeks I took the covers off today and my beautiful furniture is still beautiful. I also bought the matching chair covers. Yet the best part is how easily the go on and come off. Go ahead buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover 2 years ago. I wanted to give everyone a review if long term use. It only made it 2 years. The cover faded after the first summer but not horribly and dries out considerable and I got a few tears I was able to hold together with duct tape. This winter the cover basically disintegrated with rips and tears because it’s so dried out. It’s not a bad cover but it’s not going to last years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Moon5000

customer_reviews.title: But, Buy, Buy
customer_reviews.text: These covers are possibly the best buy I have purchased from Amazon! We bought a 4 piece patio set from Lowe's this spring for our screened patio. I wanted to purchase covers for it. Wasn't sure about the sizing but I took a chance. Good fit, not to snug, not too big. I love they have tie downs that go around the legs. Actually they latch and are a bit difficult to work but once on they do the job very well. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen, SC

customer_reviews.title: Beware - NOT ENTIRELY WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I am very disappointed with the quality. Living in Southern California we don’t get much rain so it’s taken me a couple of months (until our first rain) to realize that these covers are not entirely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: C. Santos

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and prtected the furniture from my cold snowy winter
customer_reviews.text: I covered a glider with small table with this cover. It worked great and prtected the furniture from my cold snowy winter. It is still in great shape so was well worth the money,which by the way was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: FrannieP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my woodard casa sofa
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this for the price. It fit perfect on our sofa. I choose it based on the dimensions and they were very accurate. It's a lighter color than the other similar covers I got for our chairs and table on amazon, but this one had the right fit. No big deal because when we are using the chairs they will be off. The material is heavy and feels like it will last. This was an amazon basics bargain. Just buy it if the measurements look right for you.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, doesn't look half bad either.
customer_reviews.text: It get's the job done! Looks good too. This is our second as the first one got old and brittle after a few years and a dog jumped on it and put a nice hole in the cover during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer Greg

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and yet easy to handle when putting them on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased multiple AmazonBasics covers for my patio. They're heavy, sturdy and yet easy to handle when putting them on and taking them off the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D

customer_reviews.title: Survived a hailstorm!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I expected these to be relatively disposable, perhaps something I'd replace every couple years. Nope, they're extremely well built, with solid stitching, reinforcement, and weatherproof sealing. After purchasing one of these, I was so impressed by the build quality that I ended up purchasing more for all of my patio furniture (tables, chairs, grill) - they all match, and they're all strong. In fact, these survived a brutal hailstorm - unscathed! Many roofs in the neighborhood experienced damage, as did every car parked outside. But not these covers... even the one on my solid table. After seeing them survive hail, I don't think I'll ever bother buying any other covers. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: V. Itenius

customer_reviews.title: Best buy EVER
customer_reviews.text: Bought the deep two-seater lounge sofa and the deep seater patio seat covers. Best buy EVER. They are completely water proof and protect from the dust and debris. In addition, they protect my patio furniture, which remains completely outside all year long, from pollution. Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tahia Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Were Looking For
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been looking for furniture covers for our outdoor furniture (in our enclosed screened in deck for some time. Most of what we found was cheap plastic/vinyl that looks like it would last only a season or two. Then we found these on Amazon and the reviews were favorable so we decided to give it a try. We are very pleased with the purchase so far. It fits our furniture quite well and seems like it is pretty sturdy and will stand up to more than one season. We have already had a few driving rain storms and the rain water just beaded up and rolled off.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 15 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I got it. It fit well, looked nice and protected my furniture. Unfortunately, it barely lasted 15 months. It ripped on the corner by the arm rest and it is no longer usable. They need to make a heavy duty version of this product. I also have these covers for two chairs and they seem to be holding up quite well so far. My yard has a southern exposure so these take a beating as far as the sun goes (I'm in Illinois), so in any other exposure they would probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Dob

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and thick material
customer_reviews.text: Really happy that I went with the more "expensive" cover. Covers my patio furniture well for a "universal" cover. Make sure you measure your chairs, love seats etc and double check these items will fit. Material is thick and seems that it will protect during all season. So glad I went with this rather than the cheaper light weight ones. Looks great and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: cayman

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST quality patio furniture cover!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 8 covers from this amazon basics line about two years ago. They are extremely well made, the surface is easy to clean with a gentle pressure wash. Our old expensive covers would get gunk and pollen dust embedded in them, and power wash would not clean them. They also fit our furniture very well, so the deck looks nice even with the covers on.
customer_reviews.author: Parent force

customer_reviews.title: Material cracks
customer_reviews.text: I like these covers a lot. One problem, after being outside for 2 winters they get very stiff and they crack.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy quality - does not last
customer_reviews.text: This has tears all over it after exactly 1 year and 1 week. As such Amazon is not standing behind this product. Only buy this if you are okay with replacing them EVERY YEAR. I'm out $200 getting a whole set for our outdoor furniture and they would not stand behind their own branded product. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S Roush

customer_reviews.title: Withstands Northeast weather conditions
customer_reviews.text: I live in New York City and bought these covers to protect outdoor furniture from all-season weather conditions. So far, it’s worked great with keeping furniture dry when it rains. What I’m most impressed about is it’s durability in withstanding high-wind conditions. My apartment faces the east river and it is always so windy here, especially since we’re in a high-rise building. These covers have stayed put and have reliably done it’s job in the winter, spring, summer and fall. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gingeroni

customer_reviews.title: Made it through our very windy winter.
customer_reviews.text: This cover did great over this first winter. We consistently get winds off the water greater than 15mph for a large part of the winter, not to mention several high wind storms. This cover held up, kept cushions covered and dry. Only wish it came down another 2 inches and I would have given it 5 stars, but height of cover was just a little lacking. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnatjhu

customer_reviews.title: Patio Furniture Covers = 1, Birds = 0
customer_reviews.text: Fit my patio loveseat perfectly- easy to put on and take off, great thickness of the material. Excellent workmanship, not a single defect! Straight seams, even stitching. Great deal! I also purchased the set of two lounge chair covers and have my furniture covered at a fraction of the cost of a “name brand”. They were packaged great and did not have an obnoxious plastic smell whatsoever upon opening. A+!
customer_reviews.author: ~B~

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover but dirty on outside after 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this cover is great and does the job. However, it is getting dirty with what looks like mold (see photos). It is not under any trees so it should not be from that. I always either have the outdoor couch covered or I have the cover drying over the side of the deck. It seems like it should not be getting this dirty this fast after being delivered on June 24, 2020. For reference we live in the southeast. I plan on cleaning the outside of it and spraying with scotch guard and will re-review then! My friend got the black cover so I would recommend getting that color so you don't notice the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Stutler

customer_reviews.title: Solid cover
customer_reviews.text: Had ours for a year and a half. Cover keeps a old leather sofa completely dry in our backyard. Sofa is hit every morning with the sprinkler. It's a tight fit because it's on a leather sofa that has oversize features. Just recently, the tenants ripped it because they put it on backwards. Not the fault of the cover. I'm ordering a new one. Living in Hawaii, means lots of bugs and ants. We keep ours bug free by having a small Tupperware thing, with holes punched in it and filled with some moth balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy outdoor furniture cover
customer_reviews.text: We have this covering the two-seated glider on our front porch. The fabric is very strong and sturdy; this isn't some cheap ripoff. The cover has adjustable cords with buckles at each bottom corner, and they attach the cover to the furniture wonderfully. I have no doubt this will last the winter here in Pennsylvania and protect our investment.
customer_reviews.author: McFitz

customer_reviews.title: Bought from scratch and dent section
customer_reviews.text: Buy only first line products. There were knife cuts on these covers, so I don't know how waterproof they will be. I bought filling glue for plastics to fill the cuts, negating any savings on buying damaged covers. They are heavy, generously sized, but came in all wadded up that it has taken months to flatten out. Good, secure clips to keep them from blowing away.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, not durable, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazon ”Basics”, indeed. These covers are terrible. This one barely lasted 6 months before wearing out and tearing both at the seams and elsewhere. We had replaced one of these covers in another size hoping we had just gotten a bad one, but they all wear out and tear just as quickly. If you are looking to expose your outdoor furniture to rain and the elements, these are definitely the covers for you. But if you would like covers that actually protect your furniture for more than a few months, you should probably look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable fit
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been looking for a durable cover for our large deck swing for years. It’s been passed down through three generations so protecting it is very important to us. It has clips on all four corners to keep it from blowing away in the wind. They have gone above and beyond by also adding a cinching feature at the bottom. This cover isn’t going anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jones

customer_reviews.title: I should have purchased 18 months ago!
customer_reviews.text: It took 18 months to purchase patio furniture covers. This was a mistake since I was hesitant to make the big investment by purchasing from a local outdoor furniture store where we purchased our furniture. Little did I know this product was offered on Amazon for a very reasonable price. I live in a beach town where the weather is almost always nice, but there is nightly moisture. These covers are proving to be very durable and weather/water resistant. They provide coverage that keeps our furniture dry and clean. The underclasps are also nice to have in order to secure the covers during any wind storms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great Covers for your yard furniture
customer_reviews.text: Really like these covers. They'll last you about 3 years before they start to dry-rot and you have to then be carefull with them as you take them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Covers my wicker pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these Amazon Basics fit pretty good. For the price, you cannot beat it. I have my wicker under my patio, so I need it protected from the wind-driven rain and afternoon sun. My wicker has a solid bottom so the clips will not work for me. This particular unit is not designed to go to the floor. Cover cannot wrap under outdoor furniture. See my photos. I bring the cushions inside for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up better than my last cover!
customer_reviews.text: The old cover we had for a year was breaking down. It became brittle and was tearing. So we got this one. I’ve had it now for 4 months and love how it is holding up. At first I was sort of irritated with the ties around the legs but I’ve noticed it doesn’t budge when those are on and they aren’t hard to undo. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Patio Furniture Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the finest outdoor patio furniture covers I have ever had. Beautiful fit. The corner fasteners are fantastic. Keeps the cover from blowing off on a windy day. The two color design looks great in the back yard. Nice heavy covers that will protect your furniture from dirt, rain and sun. Price was very good. Extremely happy with the purchase. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a year ago, and the seams started separating in less than 4 months. It is waterproof and weatherproof --- but it is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Will last about a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these right before Winter and they lasted the first winter. We took them off in summer and put them on the next winter and they did not make it through. I could not find anyway. To contact customer service. It has been a year and 4 Months since I purchased them, but the tears started at about 13 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Schirner

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: These have held up wonderfully in all of this summer's storms. They have not blows off and they have protected the outdoor furniture, including the cushions beautifully. I was concerned that the color would look dingy with time, however they still look good. A must have for outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Ms1Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, the AmazonBasics brand is ok stuff. However, the quality of these covers totally surpassed my expectations. Super affordable and the material is well constructed and is of high quality. Time will tell how they last but here in Texas, they were mainly bought to keep the cushions protected from water in the winter and spring and from the sun in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great for about 1 season, not good for long term use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cover in May 2019, arrived on time, looked great. The cover was used for about 6 months in Ohio in all weather and stored in a shed for the winter months. We were pleased for the first season of use. It was taken out in May 2020, a couple days later, there was a small tear, which turned into a larger tear quickly. A couple days later when putting the cover back on, a huge tear in the side with little force. So, it was great for about 6 months, but did not hold up well for long term use. Of course the tears happened just days after the 1 year warranty ended.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: We Love These Covers!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these covers! The material is heavy and well made. Colors are true to the picture and beautiful! They fit our couch and two chairs perfectly and we love the fact that they have elastic straps on the bottom corners to slip easily over the feet. We recently had some extremely heavy winds and the covers stayed in place. Heavy quality, but easy to stash in covered storage. Would highly recommend. Especially for the price, we're very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great Product  Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed another cover for an outdoor two seat bench. This is well made of good material. I especially liked the ability to attach the tabs to the legs of the furniture so it won't blow off. That's a step above what I had before. I just purchased it, but it should hold up to Minnesota winters for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie2020

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with 2 chair covers in June of this year and there is a tear in it. It’s not even on a seam. Unable to get ahold of anyone to see if it’s covered under a warranty. For the amount of money it was, it should last more then 3.5 months. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very little waterproofing
customer_reviews.text: These have a great fit and clean finish. They slipped right over my loveseat and sofa out doors. Here's the thing though, I live in Florida and the humidity is pretty pervasive. I uncovered my sofa's this morning because I had folks coming for coffee and found them wet. The rain had soaked through the covers and left my cushions sodden. I had to uncover them and hope they would dry in the sun. If you need waterproof, pay the extra money for it. Worth it not to have mildewed, frog invested furniture.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I received the sofa and two deep chair covers about two weeks ago and it’s rained a number of times since. The covers are easy to put onto the furniture and easy to remove. Furniture has stayed dry and the covers quickly repel water after rain is over. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mizmy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product durability
customer_reviews.text: This is a follow up. Initially I was very pleased with this product, we ordered 3. Today, in a windy series of gusts, the cover tore across the center, so it is no longer waterproof, to protect the cushions and pillow for our S shouldn’t happen in about 4 months of use. Very disappointed to have this experience with a well-reviewed item.
customer_reviews.author: william m.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase! Deck furniture is completely dry underneath
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the sofa, coffee table and chair covers for my new deck furniture. It rained every day for almost two weeks. The covers did a wonderful job. The cushions underneath are dry as a bone. I could not be happier with this purchase. I measured first to make sure the covers would work. The fit is perfect on my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Raleighite

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Material, works great, and great nutral color
customer_reviews.text: Thick, sturdy material, fits perfectly over the furniture. It has buckles for each leg, but works fine if you buckle 1-2 legs. You can also cinch the cord and make it tighter around the base. The color is a nutral color and looks great on our patio. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor furniture cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits perfectly over a large three seat outdoor couch. Actually it is three seats which when pushed together form a three seat lounger couch. I have used it all summer, and not one drop of rain, mud or leaves have gotten to this couch. I have also ordered a two-seat cover, and a stack chair cover. They are all working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: These are a fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this and the two matching chair covers for my wife. We dug into a lot of reviews, and these came up highly rated. It's always a risk, but so far, after over a month, they are doing extremely well. We've had 109 degree heat, wind storms, and some rain, and they're holding up. No water seeping inside. Easy to clip on, and good quality. very glad we got them
customer_reviews.author: DJ XRS

customer_reviews.title: Great protective cover for outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for outdoor furniture that is exposed to below freezing temperatures, snow and ice. The material is strong and keeps the moisture off the furniture. The straps are strong and keep the bottom secure around the furniture. So glad I purchased this cover and the smaller one for my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Fits well protects!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my large outdoor set. A little snug but it works. Strap for each leg buckles, it would be nice if the straps were longer though! I used the covers while gone for summer and they worked great even I. Our windy area. I didn’t take pictures though... fits my large Costco set!!! I bought covers for the ottomans and chairs... couch fits great this brand chairs fit very snug and barely make it....
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lawter

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I am always very careful pulling this on and off the patio furniture which is located in the shade and never in direct sunlight. But after 1 season it’s starting to rip in a few spots. However, this is cheaper than other patio furniture covers.
customer_reviews.author: Faulhabers

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We need to return this product. We thought it was for a glider It does not fit our glider and you sent us 2 of the covers. The words 2 seater does fit if it is to fit a glider. The picture shows a glider with 2 cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Furniture Covers
customer_reviews.text: These covers are way better than I expected! The quality is excellent, with straps to attach around the legs of the furniture, if you choose to use them. There are also air vent flaps that have velcro closures if you want to let air in without letting rain in! The fabric is nice and heavy and rain proof. I'm so glad I purchased these over some other ones I looked at
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product!
customer_reviews.text: These covers (I also bought two of the single chair versions) do exactly what I wanted them to do. They're easy to put on and completely waterproof. We've had a ton of rain this year, and as long as I remember to put the covers on, we don't get wet butt from our cushions. And they're attractive to boot.
customer_reviews.author: GrnBstd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked other color options (than brown bottom) but otherwise a good product! Our furniture has to stay outside year round so we just purchased these and put plastic bags over the bottom of the legs that were exposed to keep from sitting in snow. Even though the color is not my favorite, this is still a good product and I imagine it will last us a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality patio furniture cover
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the quality of these covers. They fit very nicely and don't catch in the wind. Waterproof, durable and pretty to look at! We thought these were actually better than patio covers we purchased at a furniture store.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: This won’t hold up over time
customer_reviews.text: Bought twice, thought the dog was to blame. First set the first time the dog jumped up on the covers they ripped. A lot. Bought a second set and built a simple wood frame to rest on the arms and span over the seating area to deter the dog / keep him from getting on the sofa. Less than a year later the seems split. Not the dog. This does not hold up. Not for me and not again.
customer_reviews.author: Easylikesundaymorning

customer_reviews.title: so far PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: time will tell. only thing is color, I would have loved grey to go with my existing color skeeem! Will follow up after time goes by. I like to buy for the long haul. Won't know until I use them for some time if they pass my test!
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, packages very well. Much nicer quality than I expected for great price. Very thick canvas material; easy to take on & off. I bought the large sofa sized one to cover the Bradenton Sofa which I also purchased on Amazon & it’s a perfect fit. Will use to protect against pollen, rain & to keep covered all winter!
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: it’s been almost 2 years now and they are not falling apart yet. They are a little bit faded but they still look good. We use them to cover our deck furniture which is exposed to 5 to 8 hrs of direct sunlight, rain, dust, snow, the occasional midwest storm, and temperatures from -10 F to 90 F (We live in Minnesota) I would definitely recommend them. I will try to give you an update in 2022
customer_reviews.author: Kari Martinez

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and looks durable. I live in South Florida and use this to cover our loveseats that have full exposure to hot sun and a lot of rain so will see how long it takes wear out. Have found that previous covers only last at most 2 years before ripping so hope to get a longer life from this one. Also bought a Classic Accessories brand loveseat cover for our other loveseat at same time so curious to see which one lasts longer and will be staying with that product. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Meister

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, quality fabric. They fit our furniture perfectly. The canvas material covers and hangs nicely. Easy to put onto the furniture and easy to pull off too. I thought it would be cumbersome and that it could turn into a product I wouldn’t use, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Williamvanrickley

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Looked real nice and pretty when new but after 2 summers it’s bright colors are super faded and starting to tear through our.
customer_reviews.author: Hori Tome

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these chair covers. They fit well, are extremely durable and stay on the furniture nicely with the clips and drawstrings. I live on a hill where it gets very windy, and so far the covers have stayed put, snug to the chairs. Well wort the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I didn’t buy these sooner. I have two outdoor couches under a metal gazebo..every time it rains they get wet I would have to pull 6 couchions and 6 pillows out into the sun to dry...not anymore I keep them covered unless we are gonna use the couches..we have had plenty of rain, wind, humidity May-June and the couches are bone dry under the covers..
customer_reviews.author: amie e gingerella

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased these seat covers I used to take the cushions off of my outdoor seating and put them in a container which was a pain. These covers are great because the cushions just stay on the furniture and I can cover them up. Durable and stay on the furniture even on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Altogether different

customer_reviews.title: Loved them at first, but did NOT last one season!
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were great for the first couple of months. Material seemed durable and did a fine job of keeping water off the furniture initially, but within a few months, all covers wore thin and developed multiple rips, making them virtually useless. Clearly not made to last......Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: kristin nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great porch furniture protector!
customer_reviews.text: The cover we'd been using for the past 3 years was in complete shreds (and was very unattractive). Here's hoping that this very attractive, and durable-feeling cover, lasts longer. The quality is clearly better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and even better quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these covers from the big box stores, and have been left wanting for better quality. This product has held up perfectly with no signs of sun damage all year. I've had very bad experiences with other covers even after one season (or half a season) and for the price these are the best I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beilharz

customer_reviews.title: Not UV resistant. All three have torn very easily after one season.
customer_reviews.text: Had three sets for not even a year to one winter. Fabric has become weak and chairs very easily despite only being in partial sun and mostly shade through the winter. Not resistant to build either. Try to pull down a corner and fabric just tears. Save your money and buy a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Our patio furniture is exposed to four seasons of rough weather, so I wanted to protect our investment by getting good covers. These work great and continue to keep our furniture in nice shape. The corner clips are handy, because in 40+mph wind my neighbor's furniture covers go airborne but these don't.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this October of 2019 and it is already ripped and unusable.. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyMEng

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Basic means Basic. So don’t buy piece of junk if you want to just throw money down tube. That’s what I did. They lasted a year and ripped to shreds. Pay a little more and get quality
customer_reviews.author: Crew60

customer_reviews.title: Amazon could do better...
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice however they run small. I actually ordered a larger size and it barely fit our couches. We live in Wisconsin and have a lot of elements to protect our furniture from so for the price and quality you think they would fit a little better. We have had to readjust them several times throughout the winter and get the melted water and ice off of them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover, but in less than a year there are numerous rips. It’s too bad, this was exactly what I needed for my outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Works good and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need but a bit small for our three cushion couch. My fault for not measuring. I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great covers!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great last night with the severe thunderstorm and high winds we had. It stayed put and other than water puddling at the top it kept all seat and back cushions dry.
customer_reviews.author: John Eric Ingram

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year In - Cover Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for not quite a year. I've been happy with it, and my furniture has stayed dry. Today I noticed a large rip in the fabric, and I've had it for less than a year. I've seen a couple other reviews saying the same thing, so I don't think this was a fluke. It's probably worth spending more money for a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up to the elements.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second time I purchased this exact cover. First one developed tears in the canvas after a year of use, the second one has failed even sooner. Out of the box this looks great but after some time in the sun, rain, and elements the canvas really thinned out and broke down. If you're in a mild climate this could be fine but does not stand up to the Chicago weather.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: small fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband made a couch for outdoors. This is too small. It's for a small couch, not all couches as advertised. Already opened it so now stuck keeping and waste of $50.
customer_reviews.author: Laila Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Protect my cushions
customer_reviews.text: I really should not read this as I just put these on and have not even checked to see if they work or not but I will update later if they don't do their job but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Cmcash

customer_reviews.title: Durable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor three seat cover is excellent Very durable and water resistant. Have two of the other covers for a single swivel chairs. They have buckles to wrap around the legs so they will not blow off in higher winds. Would definitely recommend this cover if your looking for durable, heavy weight and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan questionable
customer_reviews.text: The product fits perfect on our patio furniture. On our sofa the corners of the armrests there is a hole now. It's only been a year exactly.... I was hoping at least 2-3 years... Unless my expectations are unrealistic
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: BEST COVER EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have been so pleased with this brand! I had to buy another brand for my smaller chairs (for the right size)--and look at the difference. The other brand MOLDED-- these have all been in bright hot sun and humidity outside with rain in S. Florida for almost a year!! I love how nice they still look and my furniture still looks like new underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We were going to be satisfied if it lasted one season without tearing but going on year #2 and its still in great shape. Heavy duty fabric that is pliable and holds its shape
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I purchase these years ago???? This is the best weatherproof cover ever. Easy to remove and put back on especially when the weather's iffy. Bought two for the chairs as well after liking the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: Writernan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Awsome cover. Great option to tighten for wind. Easy on and off. If you arw looking for one this one is great. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nele

customer_reviews.title: These don’t last very long but are good while they do.
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive covers that do the job well. They have good contours that fit my furniture beautiful and are attractive looking. The main problem is that they split in multiple places after 1.5 years. I taped them with Gorilla tape to repair them but they stopped being functional. For the price, they okay. But I wish they lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover is much better quality than the one I paid the same price for at Lowes. Lasted through brutal SoCal summer and the heavy rain we had this year. Doesn't leak. Made of heavyweight material
customer_reviews.author: cyberlill

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Tough and durable. It's a bit small for my 3 seater, but that's on me for not measuring. Regardless its tough enough to take a stretch over the edges and keep everything clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Quality Protectors
customer_reviews.text: These covers are great! They are well made and fit great over our deck furniture. This prevents us from having to carry the furniture out to our shed for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping furniture dry!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely waterproof! I have to “fluff” to get rid of puddles that accumulate in loose areas. It definitely is protecting my outdoor furniture. I use this over 3-4 outdoor pieces, not over a couch, but it works just as great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: We use it on our outdoor furniture and it saved us multiple trips of putting way the cushions for the night or when raining! Theses take no time to put on and heavy enough the wind doesn’t touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Good quality covers
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product over a year now it’s great and keeps furniture mostly clean, sometimes some leaves and things blow up into it but it does a great job of protecting the cushions and sofa from the weather
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Barstow

customer_reviews.title: I like that feature
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavyweight and well designed. It has secure snaps to lock it in place onto the sofa to prevent it from blowing off. I like that feature. I originally bought this item to see how well it was made before I bought more for my patio chairs. I am very please with the quality of the material and I plan to now buy additional covers for all my patio furniture. I highly recommend this to any one looking for a covers to protect against wind, rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: darletta

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Update from when I bought it! I missed my return window but don’t waste your money! They seem thick and durable but it’s already torn!
customer_reviews.author: scott z

customer_reviews.title: Fit as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I covered my deck couch with this for the winter. Everything is as advertised. Fit perfect. Appears to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: DGleason

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit for my patio furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was snug and secure. A reasonable price for a cover like this. The clips at each corner secured the cover firmly to the legs of the sofa. I pulled the drawstring to tighten the cover even further, but it doesn't seem necessary. Seems like high quality, so I have high hopes for these covers protecting my furniture from the New Jersey winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Pinzopong

customer_reviews.title: Thick and protective
customer_reviews.text: Love the thickness of the material and the clips at each leg. Slightly smaller in width than advertised but the clips allowed it to work. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ELizabeth Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Furniture  Covers
customer_reviews.text: These outdoor seating covers really exceeded my expectations! They are made extremely well and are a bargain for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy F.

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 3-Seater Deep Lounge Sofa Outdoor Patio Furniture Cover
feature_bullets: 100% woven polyester fabric imported from China with a laminated polyvinyl chloride undercoating to minimize rain from seeping through
Cover protects against rain, snow and other outdoor elements
Using click-close straps, cover easily snaps around furniture to secure the cover on windy days
Tough interlocking seams add strength and durability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,038 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
